info.name: server
info.description: Email server name or IP address.

info.name: port
info.description: TCP port the email server is listening on.

info.name: tls
info.description: A string, either 'Yes' or 'No' that defines whether the email server uses TLS encryption.

info.name: from
info.description: The name and email address of the authenticating account. Provide in the format: NAME <EMAIL>

info.name: username
info.description: Authentication string of a user allowed to send emails through the email server.

info.name: password
info.description: Password associated with the specified user.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enables debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
